memberdef.name: MAKELINE
memberdef.initializer: { \ real a = -(p1.y - p0.y) * ht; \ real b = (p1.x - p0.x) * wd; \ real l = sqrtf(a * a + b * b); \ if (l == 0) \ A = B = 0; \ else \ { \ A = a / l; \ B = b / l; \ } \ C = -(A * p0.x * wd + B * p0.y * ht); \ }

memberdef.argsstring: (HWND hw, UINT msg, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam)
memberdef.name: PolyBumpUtilPolyDlgProc

memberdef.argsstring: (const Point3 tv[3], const Point3 v[3], Point3 bvec[3])
memberdef.name: compute_bump_vectors
